context: Hello there. Looking for a good movie?
I'm not picky I'm fine thank you
Well, I just saw Wind River (2017) and it’s a good mystery/ drama
I also enjoyed Avengers: Infinity War (2018) and Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018) Straight forward action movies
Hmm. Nice! All options I have not seen but heard great things about I did see Star Wars (1977) and really enjoyed that! :)
resp: For a good good comedy, I recommend Game Night (2018) Well, hopefully you can enjoy one of those.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?
I love movies that are thrilling, adventurous, and animated. It's so exciting to find a film that combines all these elements! Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I love discovering movies that are thrilling, adventurous, and animated. It's so exciting to find a film that combines all these elements! I hope the recommender has some great recommendations for me.

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Spirited Away." It's an animated film that is thrilling and adventurous, with a captivating storyline and beautiful animation. I think you'll really enjoy it!
That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about "Spirited Away"?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Spirited Away." It sounds like it has the thrilling adventure and playful animation I'm looking for. I can't wait to find out more about it!

context.content: "Spirited Away" is a Japanese animated fantasy film directed by Hayao Miyazaki. It follows the story of a young girl who becomes trapped in a mysterious and magical world after her parents are transformed into pigs. The film is filled with thrilling adventures, captivating characters, and stunning animation. It's a must-see for anyone who loves thrilling and adventurous animated movies!
That sounds amazing! I'm really excited to watch "Spirited Away." It seems to have everything I'm looking for in a movie. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm thrilled to discover "Spirited Away"! It sounds like a daring adventure with stunning animation. I can't wait to watch it and experience the excitement. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that aligns with them. I'm really looking forward to watching "Spirited Away"!

simulator_dialog.resp: For a good good comedy, I recommend Game Night (2018) Well, hopefully you can enjoy one of those.
